title: 【求助】为什么宠物插件没法打开技能表
author: a526026058
txt_content:
OP可以打开，普通玩家输入/pcst没法打开技能表，怎么办

MyPet 宠物插件的

求助各位有经验的

replies.author: a13870136617
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp Builder MyPet.custom.skilltree.ppp
/mangaddp Builder MyPet.user.command.release
/mangaddp Builder MyPet.user.command.respawn
/mangaddp Builder MyPet.user.leash.*
这些是玩家权限
